result.execSummary: Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cortney J. Bradley

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on January 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Have a hearing in Juneau Co. in about 10 days and this case will probably be consolidated into that.  Set out for status.  Status hearing scheduled for January 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Status hearing on December 5, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Klopp gives status.  Partially resolved.  Possible consolidation into a Juneau County case.  Partial restitution has been paid.  Juneau County court on October 30.  Case could be handled in Juneau County.  Removed from Br. 3 calendar already.  State has no objection.  Bond continues.
Final pre-trial on October 20, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on October 29, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on October 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Prelim. Hrg. waived, Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading.    Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial Br. 3.  Bond continues.  State notes an amended Information may be filed noting the wrong offense date.  Attorney Klopp agrees and amended Info. may be filed w/out objection.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Klopp advises of waiver of preliminary hearing.  Defendant agrees.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 3.
Preliminary hearing on September 5, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE needs to satisfy a condition precedent may be able to in 30 days.  State objects to 30 days.  Requests preliminary hearing.  Time limits continued waived.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 5, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Return date on August 13, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on July 9, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State advises Attorney Klopp request a reset.  Stayed warrant is quashed.  Attempting to consolidate with Juneau County cases.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for July 9, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on June 18, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Roger L Klopp in court.  Linda A Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Klopp has no explanation for nonappearance by DE.  Notes she has always appeared before and requests reset.  State requests warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant but stayed it until 6/18/2014.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for June 18, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on June 10, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case resolved into consolidate in Juneau Co.  6 week reset to make sure case is done.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for June 10, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on April 23, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Sue M. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Klopp states had PTC about a week ago, talked about possible settlements and may amend offer if Juneau Co. case taken care of or consolidate.  Requests 30 days.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for April 23, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on March 14, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Return date on March 24, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE just appeared 1:10.  Need another PTC and RD.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 14, 2014 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for March 24, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on March 13, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Roger L. Klopp in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE has been in contact, not sure why not here yet.    Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant but stayed one week.  Return date scheduled for March 13, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on February 21, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Return date on March 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cortney J. Bradley in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Michael Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant waives reading of complaint.   Time limits waived. $2000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Booking today.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 21, 2014 at 10:30 am.  Return date scheduled for March 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
